Other:
- Fixed shotgun heroes applying buildup effects like toxic bullets instantly on ricocheted enemies
- Parrying a Guardian now causes it to stop trying to repeatedly melee (and get parried over and over), and instead causes the boss to start shooting shortly there after
Abilities:
- {{Icon|Air Drop}} Air Drop now silences the ally being carried until they are released
- {{Icon|Bloodletting}} Bloodletting incoming damage deferred reduced from 40% to 35%
Items:
- Fixed {{Icon|High-Velocity Mag}} High-Velocity Mag affecting some abilities
- Damage reduced from 150 to 100
- Spirit damage scaling reduced from 1.5 to 1.0
- Cast range reduced from 40m to 25m
- Sprint reduced from 2 to 1
- Spirit Shield reduced from +225 to +200
- Cooldown increased from 20s to 30s
- Bullet damage returned reduced form 80% to 70%
- Dying with {{Icon|Siphon Bullets}} Siphon Bullets stacks will now cause you to lose 2 stacks no matter who killed you (rather than returning 1 only if the victim killed you back)
- Fixed {{Icon|Siphon Bullets}} Siphon Bullets acting as spirit damage for procs
